parameters: \pop[3]You don't have to do this every time.
\pop[4]I beg to differ. By a lot, actually.
That makes it feel so... disingenuous.
Did you practice that one in front of the mirror?
He's not a fan of scary sights, remember?
\pop[3]Heh. You guys never fail to entertain.
I don't know what "bit" I missed, but this is still a great welcome.
\pop[4]Well, it's a pretty big deal to get added to the group chat.
We just like to let people know how important they are.
\pop[3]Oh. In that case, I could stand to hear more about how important I am.
You're truly a part of the friend group now.
\pop[4]Just be prepared. This group is pretty chaotic.
\pop[3]I don't know if you sensed it by now, but chaos is kinda my style.
\pop[3]So what's the first order of business, then...?
\pop[4]Yeah, I think we'll just lay low today.
Make yourselves at home while I stream.
An \c[23]Argus\c[0] agent? I can't believe you want to go outside tomorrow at \c[14]all\c[0].
\pop[3]We can't just put our lives on pause.
But it'd make us look more suspicious, wouldn't it?
But doing it right after Delta saw an agent?
\pop[3]Makes it seem like we have something to be scared of.
That's the whole point. Under the radar.
\pop[4]Yeah. We'd draw more attention by making big lifestyle changes.
In this situation, "under the radar" just means living our lives like normal.
\pop[4]As normal as we can, while never splitting up.
Besides, you know you're my favorite place to be~
All this \c[10]Hermes\c[0] stuff will be over next week.
\pop[4]I'm starting to side with Kyron on this one.
You believe in \c[10]Hermes\c[0] way too much.
\pop[3]The entire \c[14]world\c[0] is staring at \c[23]Argus\c[0] right now.
Do you really think they'll just stand there and let \c[10]zeros\c[0] die?
If they made up their minds, like you think, then it's still odd.
\pop[3]I don't know. But I'll look into it at my follow-up interview.
Even if this is resolved by then, I can still try to figure out the "why".
\pop[3]You really think notes on us would be \c[14]that\c[0] easy to find?
Something tells me it would be "top secret" level stuff.
\pop[3]Yeah, but remember who you're talking to.
I have access to a lot of stuff you'd consider top secret.
Especially when it's somebody valuable like me.
\pop[3]Ironic thing to say while double-crossing them.
They're just... behind the times, and need to catch up.
\pop[3]Trust me. It's hard to relinquish something you hold dear.
They've been in charge for so long, they're \c[14]totally\c[0] out of touch.
We just need to... open their eyes to the world's needs.
All those eyes on the world, but keeping them closed?
They'll write stories about us one day.
\pop[4]I hope they do me justice as the handsome sidekick.
\pop[3]I think you have some competition for that role.
\pop[3]What's that little picture that just appeared...?
\pop[3]Really used all their creativity on \c[14]that\c[0] one.
\pop[4]It's pretty amazing, though. Especially with melted butter.
You usually eat it when you're watching something entertaining.
\pop[4]It's just no fun when you have to explain the joke...
\pop[2][Kyron starts spamming the group chat with popcorn emojis.]
